trans-unit.source: Defines the common characteristics of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Definerer vanlige karakteristikker av den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref> klasser.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.ProvideValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is sealed, a custom binding class that derives from BindingBase will not function correctly as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup extension.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.ProvideValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden er lukket, en egendefinert binding klasse som er avledet fra BindingBase vil ikke fungere som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup utvidelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.ProvideValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to which this binding belongs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> som denne bindingen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: If BindingGroupName is not set, the binding belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> only if the binding's source and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> are the same object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BindingGroupName ikke er angitt, bindingen hører til en <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>bare hvis den bindingen kilde og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>for det overordnede elementet som har den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>er det samme objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: If BindingGroupName is set to a value, the binding belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and BindingGroupName are equal.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BindingGroupName er satt til en verdi, bindingen hører til en <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>Hvis følgende betingelser er oppfylt: - <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>og BindingGroupName er like.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> belongs to a parent element of the binding's target element.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>Hører til en overordnet element i den bindingen target-element.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: If BindingGroupName is set to `null`, the binding is never a part of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis BindingGroupName er satt til `null`, bindingen er ikke en del av en <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>

trans-unit.source: You can include bindings that have a source that is different from the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the BindingGroupName property of a binding to the same value.
trans-unit.target: Du kan inkludere bindinger som har en datakilde som er forskjellig fra det <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>for det overordnede elementet som har den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>ved å angi <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>og egenskapen BindingGroupName for en binding til samme verdi.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can exclude bindings that have the same source as <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A> of the parent element that has the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> by setting <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> and the BindingGroupName property of a binding to different values.
trans-unit.target: Du kan utelate bindinger som har den samme kilden som <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>for det overordnede elementet som har den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>ved å angi <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup>og egenskapen BindingGroupName for en binding til ulike verdier.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.DataContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"></xref> to which this binding belongs.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingGroup"> </xref> som denne bindingen tilhører.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait before updating the binding source after the value on the target changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tiden, i millisekunder vente før du oppdaterer bindingen kilden etter verdien på target-endringer.

trans-unit.source: When you use a binding to update the binding source whenever the value of the property changes on the target, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en binding til å oppdatere datakilden for binding når verdien for egenskapen endres på målet, setter <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>egenskapen og <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, you can use the Delay property to specify whether there should be a time delay between when the target is changed and when the source is updated.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen forsinkelse i så fall vil angi om det skal være en forsinkelse mellom når målet er endret, og når kilden er oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to enable users to change a property on a source object but you don't want each change to be immediately committed to the source.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du vil aktivere brukere å endre en egenskap i kildeobjekt, men du ikke vil hver endringer i utføres umiddelbart til datakilden.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that you have a text box that is data two-way bound to a property of a data object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel anta at du har en tekstboks som databundet toveis til en egenskap for et dataobjekt.

trans-unit.source: When the user changes the value in the text box, the source gets updated.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren endrer verdien i tekstboksen, oppdateres kilden.

trans-unit.source: To enable this scenario, you set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> to <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> and the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.
trans-unit.target: For å aktivere dette scenarioet må angi du <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>egenskapen på den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>og <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode>den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>til <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To avoid updating the source object with every keystroke, set the Delay property to a reasonable value to cause the binding to update only after that amount of time has elapsed since the user stopped typing.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen forsinkelse i en rimelig verdi skal bruke til å oppdatere etter denne tiden har gått fordi brukeren stoppet å skrive inn-bindingen for å unngå oppdatering kildeobjektet med hver tastetrykk.

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, to wait before updating the binding source.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid i millisekunder vente før du oppdaterer bindingen kilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value to use when the binding is unable to return a value.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som skal brukes når bindingen kan ikke returnere en verdi.

trans-unit.source: A binding returns a value successfully if: 1.
trans-unit.target: En binding returnerer en verdi ble hvis: 1.

trans-unit.source: The path to the binding source resolves successfully.
trans-unit.target: Banen til datakilden for binding løser fullført.

trans-unit.source: The value converter, if any, is able to convert the resulting value.
trans-unit.target: Verdi-konverteringsprogram kan eventuelt ikke konvertere den resulterende verdien.

trans-unit.source: The resulting value is valid for the binding target (target) property.
trans-unit.target: Den resulterende verdien er ugyldig for egenskapen binding mål (mål).

trans-unit.source: If 1 and 2 return <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>, the target property is set to the value of the FallbackValue, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: Hvis 1 og 2 returnerer <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>, target-egenskap er satt til verdien for FallbackValue, hvis det er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no FallbackValue, the default value of the target property is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen FallbackValue, brukes standardverdien for target-egenskap.

trans-unit.source: The value <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName> is not considered a successful return value.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>regnes ikke en vellykket returverdi.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk ```

trans-unit.source: See that type's documentation for XAML usage information.
trans-unit.target: Se dokumentasjonen for denne typen XAML bruksinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: That type may or may not support attribute syntax for its values, or may or may not support object element syntax (which requires a default constructor on that type).
trans-unit.target: Denne typen kan støtter ikke attributtsyntaks for verdiene, eller kanskje eller støtter ikke objekt syntaks i element. (som krever en standardkonstruktør for denne typen).

trans-unit.source: The target property type will therefore influence which syntax you use for the value of the FallbackValue property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen måltypen vil derfor påvirke som du bruker for verdien for egenskapen FallbackValue syntaks.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that should be set on the property where this binding and extension are applied.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som skal angis for egenskapen der denne bindingen og filtypen brukes.

trans-unit.source: This implementation provides the base syntax support for binding through [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] for all provided practical derived classes (<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, and <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>).
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen gir støtte basis-syntaksen for bindingen til [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] for alle angitte praktisk avledede klasser (<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>, <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, og <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>).</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase> class implementation of this method is expected to return an expression object that is the result of a binding.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>Klasseimplementering av denne metoden er forventet å returnere et uttrykk-objekt som er resultatet av en binding.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>

trans-unit.source: Binding a property works by targeting a given <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> on a given <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: Bindingen en egenskapen fungerer ved å angi en gitt <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>i en gitt <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: These two pieces of information are transmitted by querying for an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget> implementation on the `serviceProvider`, which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] reader makes available during parsing of a binding.
trans-unit.target: Disse to opplysninger sendes av spørring etter en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>implementeringen av den `serviceProvider`, som den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] leseren gjør tilgjengelig under analyse av en binding.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IProvideValueTarget>

trans-unit.source: This base class implementation is responsible for checking for a valid <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty> and <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen basisklassen er ansvarlig for å se etter et gyldig <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>og <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: If these are found, the actual implementation of returning a binding expression falls to various derived classes, as implemented by having the base class call an internal abstract method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis disse finnes, går faktiske implementeringen av returnerer et bindingsuttrykk til forskjellige avledede klasser som implementeres av har basisklassen kallet en intern abstrakt metode.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the extension returns the binding object itself.
trans-unit.target: Ellers returneres utvidelsen selve binding-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returning the binding itself results in a type mismatch error, but this should not occur under normal circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer bindingen selve fører til en type samsvarer ikke, men dette bør ikke oppstå under normale omstendigheter.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because the syntax for binding through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] as implemented in this method relies on implementing an internal override, and because ProvideValue itself is sealed, a custom binding class that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase> will not function correctly as a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup extension.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Fordi syntaksen for bindingen til [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] som implementert i denne metoden avhenger av implementering av en intern overstyring, og fordi ProvideValue selve er lukket, en egendefinert binding klasse som er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>vil ikke fungere som en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup utvidelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase>

trans-unit.source: The object that can provide services for the markup extension.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som kan gi tjenester for markup filtypen.

trans-unit.source: May be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; see the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: Det kan hende <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; se under merknader for mer informasjon.

trans-unit.source: The value to set on the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen binding mål.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om serialisering prosesser må serialisere effektive verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>egenskapen for forekomster av denne klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>egenskapsverdi må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.FallbackValue*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*> property should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*>egenskapen skal serialiseres.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*> property should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*>egenskapen må være serialiserte; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingBase.TargetNullValue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that specifies how to format the binding if it displays the bound value as a string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en streng som angir hvordan du formaterer bindingen Hvis vises bundne verdien som en streng.

trans-unit.source: StringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: StringFormat kan være en forhåndsdefinert sammensatte eller egendefinerte strengformat.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om streng formatene [formateringstyper](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A> and StringFormat properties, the converter is applied to the data value first, and then the StringFormat is applied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir den <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A>og StringFormat egenskaper konverteringen gjelder dataverdien først, og deretter StringFormat brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Converter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the StringFormat on a <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> to a composite string format, you can specify only one parameter.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir StringFormat på en <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>til en sammensatt strengformat, kan du angi bare én parameter.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>, the StringFormat property applies only when it is set on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>egenskapen StringFormat gjelder bare når det er angitt i <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: The value of StringFormat that is set on any child <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for StringFormat som er angitt for en underordnet <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>objekter ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters in a composite string format cannot exceed the number of child <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.
trans-unit.target: Antallet parametere i en sammensatt strengformat kan ikke overskride antall underordnede <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>objekter i <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, you can set the StringFormat on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, on child binding objects, or both.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, kan du angi StringFormat på den <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>, på underordnet binding objekter eller begge deler.</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>

trans-unit.source: If the StringFormat is set on the child binding that is applied, that value is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis StringFormat angis på underordnet binding som skal brukes, brukes denne verdien.

trans-unit.source: If the StringFormat is not set on the child binding that is applied, the StringFormat of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding> is applied if it is set.
trans-unit.target: Hvis StringFormat ikke er angitt for underordnet binding som brukes, StringFormat av den <xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>brukes hvis den er angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Data.PriorityBinding>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies how to format the binding if it displays the bound value as a string.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir hvordan du formaterer bindingen Hvis vises bundne verdien som en streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that is used in the target when the value of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien som brukes i mål når verdien for datakilden er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML teksten Bruk ```

trans-unit.source: See that type's documentation for XAML usage information.
trans-unit.target: Se dokumentasjonen for denne typen XAML bruksinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: That type may or may not support attribute syntax for its values, or may or may not support object element syntax (which requires a default constructor on that type).
trans-unit.target: Denne typen kan støtter ikke attributtsyntaks for verdiene, eller kanskje eller støtter ikke objekt syntaks i element. (som krever en standardkonstruktør for denne typen).

trans-unit.source: The value that is used in the target when the value of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er brukt i målet når verdien for datakilden er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
